titles.title: A resolution designating September 16, 2017, as "Isaac M. Wise Temple Day".
A resolution designating September 16, 2017, as "Isaac M. Wise Temple Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates September 16, 2017, as Isaac M. Wise Temple Day.
Recognizes the importance of the Isaac M. Wise Temple in Cincinnati, Ohio, in:
U.S. Jewish history; establishing Cincinnati as a great center of Jewish life, and contributing to religious life in the United States.
